instructions: This is a sheet designed around a free game called Spylite: http://microlite20.net/files/SpyLite.pdf .  The game is built off of the Microlite20 base system, and changed for a spy-like atmosphere.  In addition, Spylite is also the base system for a Cyberpunk variant (a Microlite20 version of Cyberpunk2020 and Shadowrun).
